ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(TEXT(StageName) = "4 - Offer" , TEXT(StageName)= "5 - Awarded"), $Permission.Bypass_validation_rule = FALSE, $User.Username != 'servicenow.integrationuser@soprasteria.com' , $User.Country != "Sweden", TEXT(Type) != 'Frame agreement', TEXT(Type) != 'Capacity agreement', ISBLANK(TEXT(Contract_Price_Model__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Price / delivery Model is required when Stage is 4 - Offer or higher, except for Frame Agreement and Capacity Agreement
